description:
Kit has sex with both men and woman, but his first time giving a guy a blowjob at a club certainly peaked his interest, and made him want to explore that side of him more.

“I was all for it! I was gonna give the best head this dude had ever had, because I’m a guy and I know what I like, so I damn sure knew what he wanted! Oh yeah…came all over my face.”

Kit is definitely a pleaser! The fact that he also loves to play with his hole while he jerks off is an added bonus.
title: Kit
